report.title: Medical Balm
report.author: RN NP
report.bodytext: I cannot smoke any substances, so decided to try to make a topical medical marijuana preparation. I stirred a handful of mixed bud into two thirds of a jar of Nivea Cream (using a fork and the opaque blue jar). /n /n A small dab rubbed into my sprained ankle gives a localized slightly numb sensation. The systemic effects are subtle and mild. /n /n I am very satisfied with this lightly analgesic and relaxing preparation. It's just enough to take the edge off. /n /n Warning: users may smell like a barnyard, with floral overtones.
